content.en: Consensus algorithms: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address different research questions related to achieving consensus in multi-agent systems. These algorithms are designed to solve problems such as achieving stationary consensus, H∞ consensus, adaptive consensus, robust consensus tracking, finite-time consensus, and decentralized consensus, among others. The algorithms aim to enable effective communication and coordination among the agents in the system, allowing them to reach an agreement or common goal.
content.da: Konsensusalgoritmer: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at adressere forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til at opnå konsensus i multi-agent systemer. Disse algoritmer er designet til at løse problemer som at opnå stationær konsensus, H∞ konsensus, adaptiv konsensus, robust konsensustracking, finittidskonsensus og decentraliseret konsensus, blandt andre. Algoritmerne sigter mod at muliggøre effektiv kommunikation og koordinering mellem agenterne i systemet, så de kan nå til enighed eller et fælles mål.
